SEARCH
Package com.project.src.filters

Class FilterObj

java.lang.Object
com.project.src.filters.FilterObj
public class FilterObj extends Object
Class for managing and displaying a dropdown list used for filtering expenses by category. This class uses the ControlP5 library to create a dropdown list for selecting an expense category.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Angelo Ripamonti invalid input: '&' Luca Avveduto

  • Constructor Details

    • FilterObj

      public FilterObj(controlP5.ControlP5 cp5, processing.core.PApplet parent) throws NullPointerException
      Constructs a FilterObj with the specified ControlP5 instance and PApplet parent. Initializes the dropdown list with predefined categories.
      Parameters:
      cp5 - the ControlP5 instance used for UI controls. Must not be null.
      parent - the PApplet instance used for drawing. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.

  • Method Details

    • callback

      public Categories callback(int cat) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Converts the index of the selected item to a Categories enum value.
      Parameters:
      cat - the index of the selected item. Must not be less than 0 or more than 3.
      Returns:
      the corresponding Categories value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if cat is less than 0 or more than 3

    • showList

      public void showList()
      Shows the dropdown list.

      Hides the dropdown list.
